series_description: This series documents the requirement for local electoral boards to order absentee ballots and send them to voters in a timely manner. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports that include election date and information required by the State Board of Elections for compliance with federal and state requirements.

This series documents the certified record of election results sent to the State Board of Elections by the local electoral These abstracts are used to tabulate offical election results consist of preprinted forms filled in to show the name of the locality, title of the elective office and district, names of the candidates, total vote each received, statement of certification and date, the signatures of the local electoral board, and the seal of the board. This series may include, but is not limited abstracts of votes

This series documents campaign expense accounts that the source and the amount of funding for all candidates for office in Virginia and for all political commitees. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, campaign finance disclosure reports, statements and forms for a candidate or for a committee supporting candidates for nomination or election to state, local, and constitutional offices

This series documents the processes and required filings for qualifying candidates for federal, statewide, and local offices in all elections. This series may include but is not limited to: Methods of Nomination, Certificates of Candidate Qualification, Declaration of Candidacy, petitions, Certification of and Certification of filings of Statements of Economic Interest
This series documents questions placed on ballots and their neutral explanations, as well as their distribution of the local registrar offices

series_title: COV 30-19.10 Correspondence with Voter Registration, Clerk of Court, and Political Party Officials
series_description: This series documents incoming and outgoing memorandums and letters related to explanations or clarifications of elections laws and procedures from the Board of Elections staff to local officials.

This series documents the meeting of the electoral college a Presidential election. This series may include, but is not limited to: minutes, program, Certificate of Vote, and of Ascertainment signed by the Governor

series_title: Virginja Election and Registration Information Records
series_description: This series documents the administration of elections in the Commonwealth, including records in the Virginia Election and Registration Information System (VERIS). This series but is not limited to: voter registration records, election administration records, including election results, prohibited voter records and reports
This series documents the certification of voting equipment by the State Board of Elections. This series may include, but is limited to: certifications of equipment filed by local electoral boards
retention_statement: 2 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents local electoral board voting equipment security plan requirements and administration. This series include, but is not limited to: security plans
